website_summaries.verdict: The best value. Though not as well-made as more costly makeup brushes, it offers a lot of brushes for a low price.
pros: Offers large selection of brushes at a value price
We love its roll-up carrying case, made from earth-friendly materials
cons: Some users don't have the need for so many brushes, and some of the larger brushes shed

customer_reviews.title: No, just....no
customer_reviews.text: I gave these brushes one star because I couldn't leave it at zero. Please just save your money. There is not one brush in this set that I found usable. The bristles are not soft at all and you feel like you're sticking yourself with needles when you try to apply makeup with them. They shed too. There are other brush sets you can get on Amazon that are much better for around the same price. Don't get sucked in by the quantity that you get with this set because the quality is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Set of Brushes/Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Yes, they smelled like chemicals when I unwrapped them. But leaving them open for a couple of days dissipated the smell. All new brushes need to be "groomed" to remove loose bristles. After that, no shedding. The larger brushes are soft, the angle brushes are perfect for lining and contouring eyes. Each brush is not labeled, but if you're experienced at all with makeup, you'll know what they are for - fan brushes, angle brushes, powder brushes, concealer and foundation brushes, several eye color brushes and applicators - plenty of variety for every makeup application. As a makeup artist, these are a good addition to my kits. For the price, anyone could afford this set.
customer_reviews.author: Perki Winkle

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STARTER BRUSHES
customer_reviews.text: I like the brushes. I've had very little fall out and excellent experience with application, and blending. There are brushes, and while they're not numbered or indicated, you can figure out which brushes are for what. Are these the best brushes, no. They're the best brushes for right now. I have better brushes, and I'll continue to use them as well, but wile they are better, lovelier brushes, I will use them as well as these. I love the brush holder/bag. Its very convenient, and quite handy. This is good for a start up...on your way to better brushes one at a time. Its a good buy. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FUCHESS

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushes! Very good quality without shedding, soft and fine, the brush set solve all my need for makeup, I used them daily and very easy to clean. A very nice set especially it's inexpensive, I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Bai

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are super amazing and no matter what the task is to do on my face, I have a brush for that, thank you for the case also it is great I just open it up and fold it up and all my brushes stay safe and clean. Love it and highly recommend it to anyone who wears makeup.
customer_reviews.author: happycamper

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you something if you are looking for brushes for make up these are not! First they are really small, second when you open them they already falling apart and third they smell so bad that I would think 1000 times to put it on my face! For those that are saying they are good for the price sorry but you can find really good brushes for the same price! So save your money and research better because it looks like a lot of this reviews are spam and that is why it has almost 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bad texture
customer_reviews.text: the brush's bristles are not at all soft, they dont really pick up pigment well, and they definitely do not work for blending well. i'm not even that into makeup and i know these are low quality. i suppose i was cheap and therefore got cheap products.
customer_reviews.author: user

customer_reviews.title: A favorite gift at christmas
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 15 year old daughter. She absolutely loved the set. She has a love for make up and the different style brushes are perfect for her. My only complaint is the pouch which is great for keeping the brushes in order has, a chemical smell. Not sure what it is or why. It is a great price and I am sure she will get much use out of the majority of brushes. I would like to maybr see an insert describing the brushes and their use included in the pack. Although, it didn't seem to bother my daughter she knew what most were used for. Great gift and it was a success!
customer_reviews.author: Kindergartenteach

customer_reviews.title: Buy this brush set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 years ago & they are still in good condition! They are still nice and soft! I use these daily! The highlighter brush is my favorite! Nice & thick & applies highlight so nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginners, But do Not Last Long
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are a very good choice for the budding makeup artist, and are quite a good deal. However, they are not easy to clean and tend to fall apart when applying a dense product. I have had to brush bristles off of a client's face on multiple occasions and the heads of several of the brushes pop off with very little effort. The carrying case is easy to clean, but not very well made. After just under six months, the strings that one would use to tie it have begun to tear.
customer_reviews.author: The Blue Perspective

customer_reviews.title: No problems with the brushes
customer_reviews.text: I got my brushes and washed them in warm soap water I did not experience extreme shedding like some of the other reviews suggested, yes it smelled funny at first but that scent quickly when away. The only con for me is that as a beginner I wished the brushes has its name on it, so I can know which brush is for what. That would have been a great help esp as there are so many brushes. I would recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: nataniar

customer_reviews.title: Awesome selection
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a gift and neither of us has any idea what to do with half of these brushes, but it's nice to have options! They're all soft and don't seem like they'll fall apart or anything. The case smelled strongly like paint thinner when I received it-- I had to let it air out for several days before giving it to her and the smell was still somewhat noticeable. Not that big of a deal though, considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: eBoTrade 32 Pcs Professional Cosmetic Makeup Brush Set Kit with Synthetic Leather Case,Black
customer_reviews.text: Set has every size brush you will need. Product is as described by seller. Fast shipper!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila F.

customer_reviews.title: maybe for over 2 years and thery are still in very good shape, loved them
customer_reviews.text: i had had these for a very long time, maybe for over 2 years and thery are still in very good shape, loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Idelia Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Too strong of smell!!!
customer_reviews.text: The super bad thing about this set is the smell!!! The main black bag smelled so much like plastic and chemicals I had to throw it out. The quality of brushes is ok but not super professional by any means. Good for the $ though. I didn't like that it didn't have a smudge stick/brush at all. I wld recommend buying some brush shampoo for these since I felt they were soaked in chemicals. Worth it for the price though! Wld feel bad to give as gift cause of smell.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Watters

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The Bristles on this set are even stiffer than I expected. not very good for applying blush or eyeshadow. The bristles fall out easily and one of my brushes has already fallen apart (I have had the kit for about 2 months and use it about 3 times a week) I bought an E. L. F. brush at the same time as this set, and I will be purchasing the rest of the elf set, much better quality for a decent price. This product is poorly and cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: HSal

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I must say for the price these are decent quality brushes. Some better than others, but they serve their purpose and unless you're actually brushing them against your skin, you can not tell that they are not higher quality brushes. My set actually came missing a brush but hard to say which one since there are so many. I'm not hurting for any so no harm, no foul. It's a great starter kit.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Missy

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my granddaughter for Christmas and when she opened it up and saw all the brushes she was like wow. I had seen many reviews saying that the brushes fell apart and smelled bad but this is not true at least for the set I got my granddaughter. It really looks like something professionals would have. I definitely recommend this set of brushes.
customer_reviews.author: lluera

customer_reviews.title: No damage to report
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the brushes were marked like which one is used for what.
customer_reviews.author: Rose J

customer_reviews.title: pretty
customer_reviews.text: I want to start comestology school so these are great ! There was not a funky smell like some reviews say and they were all nicely packaged . The brissells on the brush may be little to rough for the eyes and skin but not to bad. Also I pulled and played with the brushing I didn't experience any shedding . Only issue is that I can't identify all the brushes and the use of them.
customer_reviews.author: CalGal

customer_reviews.title: Excelente as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I Bought these brushes as a gift for my girlfriend. He loves it, he already has more than a year with them and they look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Arturo Sangiao

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to think of what to say about this product that's not clear in the picture. All brushes were there, none had problems with shedding, great deal. The package had a chemically plastic smell to it, but nothing bothersome. I really can't imagine any brushes doing a better job, and I've seen individual pieces that cost more than this.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen Zecchino

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I received the product very quickly! When I opened the package It was exactly what I had expected! Great Price for 32 brushes and case! Does exactly what I need them to do! The bigger brushes do shed a bit and are a little rough but they still do the job! Some talk about the fact that a few of the brushes look the same ...a few do look similar but with a second look you can tell that they are all different. As for the smell some are complaining about....I would assume most packages wrapped in plastic would have a smell...it doesn't bother me plus the smell wears off ...and hey you can't please everyone! Great Deal over all!
customer_reviews.author: angel latham

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Ignore all the negative comments about the brushes being hard/rough or shedding or being flimsy i admit that i was skeptical at first about purchasing this product because of them. But this set is awesome, the brushes are super soft. there is a great variety of brushes for a very reasonable price and plus they came a day earlier. the only reason i didn't give this product five stars is because they do smell like paint. but that would go away with time and a few washes. Purchase asap
customer_reviews.author: kaybee

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal If you ask me!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets for Christmas, one for my daughter and one for my friend. Well my daughter got hers but my poor friend never did! I liked them so much that they went right in my stocking! These are wonderful! My daughter who is a model and I who am not both LOVE these! Great deal and great gift if you can part with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: They work pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Brushed are good quality I have had them for a while now the gule on the brushes is starting to wear off however there great buy in starting your makeup kit
customer_reviews.author: Luz Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Love but...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for one of my makeup classes for school and I loved them so much I used them for my everyday makeup use. The only reason I rated the set with three stars is that when I opened the package, one of the section holders that hold the bigger brushes, the seam had torn from full holder itself so now there's a gap. Also one of my brushes was broken: the metal part that holds the brush had separated from the stick part. I had to glue the pieces back together. As I said I love these brushes it's just how it arrived to me that is the reason for my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and was a bit skeptical since they said it smells and sheds but I just got my brushes yesterday and they are great! There a slight smell but not enough to deter me from buying it and I'm sure it will go away. It's like a new car smell :-) Also, I checked all the brushes and my brushes were not really shedding. Maybe a hair or two but nothing too absurd. Overall great product especially for the price. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CLaudia Telles

customer_reviews.title: MISLEADING ADVERTISEMENT - NOT PROFESSIONAL
customer_reviews.text: HOW CAN YOU CALL THESE PROFESSIONAL? Cheap plastic case that stinks REALLY bad. Fan brushes are flimsy. NO BLENDING BRUSH for eyeshadow!! I gave this to my 11-year old daughter to play pretend makeup with. Feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Kate G.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received my brushes a few days ago and I LOVE them! I thought that there would be problems because they are so inexpensive and some reviews have been pretty bad, but I've had no issues at all. I haven't seen any fallout yet, my brush pouch doesn't stink (It smells like pears for some reason), and the brushes actually do a good job. There are a few duplicates, but, as I am fairly new to makeup, I don't know whether this is by design or not. I don't see it as a problem at all though.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Horrible makeup brushes
customer_reviews.text: Horrible makeup brushes. These brushes shed like their animals or something... it makes me itch while Im applying makeup. I always have to get the bristles off my face after I use a brush. Its annoying Ill never buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Abriah Todd

customer_reviews.title: This set is great! ...Other than the five biggest brushes.
customer_reviews.text: All of these brushes but the five biggest brushes are super high quality and I definitely recommend this set to anyone who is on a tight budget like myself. The five biggest brushes shed a LOT and they're really rough on your face. You just have to get a kabuki and stippling brush for foundation and powder, otherwise you'll have bristles all over your face and your face will be rubbed raw because those five brushes are so rough. But for such a cheap price I would recommend these brushes anyway. Luckily I already have a kabuki brush, I just need to get a stippling brush and my collection will be complete. I'm very pleased with my brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi Sanders

customer_reviews.title: the synthetic fibers are sooo easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are the bees knees! the synthetic fibers are sooo easy to clean. The application isn't quite as smooth as with real hair brushes, but it's not far off. I would recommend these to the professional, or the enthusiast! Great price for a great selection of brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice brush set!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice brush set, I have been using it everytime I apply makeup to see how it works. The only gripe I have is the minimal shedding. Luckily enough it is not a lot of hairy shedding. I really do enjoy the soft texture of the burshes against my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: VeaBea

customer_reviews.title: there ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set around 6 months ago and soon realized they dont hold make up well, especially most of the smaller brushes and a few of them are coming off of from the stick/handle but the hair stays in tact wich is pretty cool. I guess a hot glue gun is all u need to make them like new again. Mostly the big brushes work properly and are very good But I will say that they all look pretty and are very soft. And I haven't seen any shedding of the brushes at all so thats rilly good.
customer_reviews.author: juanita

customer_reviews.title: okay brushes
customer_reviews.text: Had a weird gasoline smell. Had a lot of shedding when opened brush set. The face brushes are kind of coarse but the eye brushes are pretty soft. Havent used yet but all in all they are okay. I will probally give to my toddler who's obsessed with makeup lol after I clean of course. But they do look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad price but....
customer_reviews.text: I would rate this product a 2.5 considering that half of the brushes basically fall apart. I would recommend interested buyers to go to Walmart and/or Target to buy ELF make-up brushes. You won't be getting the same amount of brushes for the price but they are way better and still very affordable. I have a couple ELF brushes and I actually like better than my MAC brushes. Like I said though, half the brushes are nice but all of the larger sized brushes fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Absolutly Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding? 20 brushes for 20 bucks? THEY WHERE AMAZING! I will NEVER have to buy brushes again for 5 years. I don't have to hold up a hand to show you how many things are wrong with this. My daughter bought these for all of her dance competitions and has used them a million times and not 1 piece has fallen off of even 1. All the crap about things falling off of everything but they really don't. Buy these if you are considering, if don't and follow all the other wrong reviews you have misted out. There all wrong. But this one is right!
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Metcalfe

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for my daughter she loved the set and I loved price and fast delivery ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for my daughter she loved the set and I loved price and fast delivery especially since she added this to her list at last minute!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushes!!!
customer_reviews.text: there arent many large brushes, its more small brushes for applying eyeshadow and such. The larger highlighter flat brush was crushed but i put it under a textbook over night and fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin McArdle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't review things I buy on Amazon, but I just had to with this one. I bought this, not really expecting a whole lot out of it. When I opened the package I will admit there was a smell, but to me it smelled like paint, which is a pleasant smell to me. I left it unrolled in my room for about an hour and the smell went away. The case it came in is wonderful. The brushes are very soft and easy to use. Make sure you wash them though before you use them. I haven't had any trouble with them falling apart. I'm so glad I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: IntelligentBeauty

customer_reviews.title: brush set
customer_reviews.text: the Alice Super Professional Studio Brush Set with Pouch, Gift idea BLACK32PCS works good smooth and nice. they are a good purch.
customer_reviews.author: cor

customer_reviews.title: Great for a beginner.
customer_reviews.text: Got the brushes just as described. Some were okay. Some were falling apart when I was applying my make-up but over all came in handy. For a beginner that's barely learning what's what with each brush. So not bad for a beginner and the price wasn't bad either. And came in a pouch so that's a plus as well.
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got this because after checking out others, this one looked the best. I have no clue what all the brushes are for but I am trying to find out. The brushes I have used work great and no loose bristles yet. I am happy with this and I think if you got this you would be too.
customer_reviews.author: April P

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are great girl the price but they are by no means on the professional or even semi professional level. Giving them as a gift to a youngster who loves makeup would be great but if you are a serious makeup artist or are picky about you brushes. These are not fir you.
customer_reviews.author: Latrena Smith-Waller

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: Brushes fell apart at first use. Most of them fell apart when I cleaned them. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha B.

customer_reviews.title: 3 years strong
customer_reviews.text: I have had these brushes for almost three years, and i love them more each time I use them. Saves money from purchasing individual brushes because this comes with all that you need! I expreienced a few shedding on the initial use, but nothing major at all.
customer_reviews.author: QueenGoldie

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $15
customer_reviews.text: $15, can you say STEAL!? Such a good deal! Yes, it does have a strongish leather smell, but you're dumb if you didn't expect that considering it's been tightly packaged.. 32 is ALOT of brushes! I wouldn't get these if you were looking for face makeup brushes. I basically ignored those cuz they were so rough on the face! Precision brushes are great! Picks up product! I used the thin brushes for my fluid line eyeliner, SO MUCH EASIER! brushes are abit flat. I would definitely recommend to those trying to expand their brush collection!
customer_reviews.author: Miss T

customer_reviews.title: It came in very nice wrapping and in decent time but the product itself ...
customer_reviews.text: It came in very nice wrapping and in decent time but the product itself sheds a lot and does not pick up much shadow. It is not good for blending.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Herman

customer_reviews.title: While they are not made of the finest materials, they do what they were purchased for
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these. While they are not made of the finest materials, they do what they were purchased for. I cannot see paying tons of money for make up brushes, worth the money. Use mine everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful set of brushes.  Super buy.
customer_reviews.text: I did not find a funny smell as others have and I really like the roll up bag for travel. Would think of buying again when the price goes down some. I travel alot and seem to miss place them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: MASmith

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and very course
customer_reviews.text: The brush set had a slight smell to it, but I laid it out in my room, and after about 5 hours, the smell was mostly gone. So, the complaint about them smelling didn't happen after I laid them out. Although, some of the other comments were right about the bristles falling out. Although the price is very good for the amount of brushes you get, the quality is definitely not worth it. Especially if you have other more expensive brushes to compare it too. They have very thick bristles, and are hard and uncomfortable on my face. I recommend the real technique brushes instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Torn...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great. Clean. Nothing ruined. No invoice. I found that the eye/lip brushes were great. The highlight/blush/etc. not so good. Really flimsy I couldn't collect pigment. Case does smell but it goes away. The case is GREAAAAT though... even if the brushes don't work for you. I wish the brushes were labeled. Arrived on time. It would've been 3 stars but when the set arrived it was missing a brush so... boo...
customer_reviews.author: TheOriginalZad

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased. I don't know how well they wor yet ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived on time. Look exactly as described. I'm pleased. I don't know how well they wor yet because they're a christmas a gift.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are very poor quality, definitely do not recommend. They are flimsy bristles that don't hold onto product very well
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Vessey

customer_reviews.title: Ditch the disgusting case and you're left with some handy brushes!
customer_reviews.text: Okay I'm not even going to lie, the case these brushes came in smelled like straight up gasoline. I immediately pitched the case. The quality of these brushes is excellent for the price. There are a couple of duplicates but I find that to be handy. LOVE this set, would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: SuperDrea

customer_reviews.title: NOT Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set and the brushes are not good quality at all. The brush is not connected(glued) to the brush extensions. Also the brush hair is by far the poorest quality I have ever encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I like these brushes, however, the black hair brushes shed really bad and they all smelt like spray paint when I got them and it took a while for the smell to get out. Other than that, great product! I recommend it if you don't mind the shedding and the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Vagner

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Not the best brushes but it does give you a variety. The pouch is great to have if you are a MUA.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Sutton

customer_reviews.title: A gift
customer_reviews.text: Already left a response for this, but to follow it up, we are happy with our purchase and the person who received it is very happy with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: rance chilafoux

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: These are so amazing despite the price! There was a slight paint smell but it was mostly the the thing they came wrapped in. I use these for everything from contouring and highlighting to just natural looking makeup.
customer_reviews.author: jasmine reyes

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice For The Price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them! They aren't cheaply made and clean nicely. I would buy another set for her when it needs to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Misses B

customer_reviews.title: Great Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. Can't beat the price. It's fun to use and I love how everything fits and packs away nicely. I would recommend this for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Clare B.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Wait
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3 young adult daughters, they feel like MODELS with these brushes. Took a LONG time to come, didn't realize coming from China. They are happy with their gifts!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberli Harbert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great product they have almost all the brushes u could need its amazing my only complaint is they were supposed to give me a free product but no biggie brushes are great
customer_reviews.author: dwayne

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I guess when I saw it on amazon wow 32 count brushes so when I received it just too many brushes to choose from. It's okay I just changed some of my old brushes.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Abad

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: i am very pleased with this brush set, it does have a smell at first but it is normal, just leave open for a couple hours and take all the plastic off. The brushes are so smooth and soft, many to choose from. I will absolutely being ordering from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Denier

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This is honestly a great item for the price. My only complaint was that several of the brushes fell apart but were very simple to fix, all they needed was a bit of glue. They did not shed and I really like the carrier they come in. The buyer also made it a very simple process. Very happy with the item & the buyer. I will defiantly buy from this seller again & would recommend friends.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin L.

customer_reviews.title: I'm In Love
customer_reviews.text: I Love this set. I have being doing make up for years and decided to take it up as a business and needed a new set of brushes to work with instead of using my personal ones. Some one referred me to Amazon and to my suprise the brushes was not as expensive as some other sites that wanted 75.00-125.00 for a set. The shipping price was just right! And all came individually wrapped. They are of good quality and I look forward to using them more!
customer_reviews.author: Monai

customer_reviews.title: ... leave pieces on your face is gross I wouldn't waste my money on this ever
customer_reviews.text: Cheap brushes leave pieces on your face is gross I wouldn't waste my money on this ever.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Couch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage daughter. So far she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Astsgt

customer_reviews.title: Make-up Brushes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my niece two years a go as a Christmas gift and she loved it. I finally thought about getting myself a set and I'm glad I did! There's a light smell and that's expected; I know in a few weeks it will be gone. Love the brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Love Romatic Movies

customer_reviews.title: New Leather SmeLL!  This Brush set work WeLL
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it smells but its in a Leather Pouch! These are great brushes! here another nice thing about the brush set is that it came looking like the picture!
customer_reviews.author: LisaCats

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality isn't very good. Brushes leave bristles everywhere when you use them. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie DeMello

customer_reviews.title: SlamDUNK
customer_reviews.text: Absolutly wonderful. These are very well constructed brushes and a great variety. I'm so pleased with them-my favorite brush set bought yet! (Rhym unintended) They do smell a bit like paint upon arrival but it wears away quickly. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan S.

customer_reviews.title: But there not the worse brushes in the world some I mean some work ...
customer_reviews.text: these are definitely not MAC brushes.. I find it unfair that they would try to trick people to buy them by posting pictures of Mac brushes. But there not the worse brushes in the world I mean some work good others not so well.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: Amazing brushes for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't smell almost at to me like most of reviews say. The leather pouch is really nice. The brushes are soft and good quality, didn't shed almost at all even after I washed them. Only down fall is I wish there were more Eyeshadow brushes, but super good for the price and quality Will be repurchasing for my make kit for clients.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these as a gift for a family member.. but i like them so much that i HAD to order another just for myself! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lorann Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these as I do makeup for weddings and other events, and they are good but not great. I think I will continue to use them and slowly build a better collect. But I will save these for backup and definitely would by them for my daughter once she starts wearing makeup as starter brushes:)
customer_reviews.author: Toby Adams

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy... Great Price
customer_reviews.text: For the price the brushes are great. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is they're a little harder than I would like but all in all love them. The shipping was great received it in 3 days from ordering. There was no odor like some people say. I haven't had any problems with shedding. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jayla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Good quality brushes! Bought one for all the woman in my family!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly frodyma

customer_reviews.title: So many brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love these brushes. They work great and apply makeup flawlessly. I was personally very happy with this purchase. I use them every day :)
customer_reviews.author: Belinda

customer_reviews.title: So cool
customer_reviews.text: This brush set is great quality and provides so many choices to be able to do really great makeup. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Baunach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, feel amazing, and work wonderfully to spread powder, blush and eye shadow. I got these originally for a friend for her birthday and immediately purchased some for myself!
customer_reviews.author: ecaroline

customer_reviews.title: ... got them they were broken down by them they suck 😭😭
customer_reviews.text: False advertisement the brushes for an Mac some of them when I got them they were broken down by them they suck 😭😭
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: wife love it
customer_reviews.text: she think now she is a professional she made great design and the fiber are soft and delicate great for maintenance
customer_reviews.author: Rudy Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. They work amazing and I cant be happier. The only thing I would say is the bristles shed a little. Other than that I would buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Maria C. Marcel

customer_reviews.title: Needs better quality.
customer_reviews.text: Yes you may get what you pay for but the quality on the brushes isn't the best. Whenever I received the brushes they were all very well packaged but whenever I began to take them out of the packaging some hairs from the brushes kept falling. Even when I clean them a couple of brush hairs fall out. I wouldn't but this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good brushes except for one thing
customer_reviews.text: It came very fast . I loved the brushes Untill the fan brush I noticed was pulling out and shedding in great amounts as if it wasn't glued properly into the brush
customer_reviews.author: datrupocahontas

customer_reviews.title: ok product
customer_reviews.text: Some of the larger brushes shedding . There are falling apart before I used them. But the smaller ones are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: love my brushes, they seem to shed some but with the price you cant beat this set, would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: Sister loved it. It came with all items nothing missing at all. I have heard no complaints from my sister about it.
customer_reviews.author: David  MoralesTop Contributor: Pokémon

customer_reviews.title: My new brushes
customer_reviews.text: I love my new brushes, there are so many that some of them I don't know for what to use it...still love it
customer_reviews.author: EM

customer_reviews.title: perfect kit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect started kit to see what works for you, I would highly recommend these brushes!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great brushes
customer_reviews.text: These brushes are great and there is a lot to choose from. The only gripe I had was some of the brush bristles were bent back. But I can get something to reshape them.
customer_reviews.author: Scarly Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg I love this so much. I uses it every day
customer_reviews.author: MaryBrown

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The brushes shed the hairs quite easily. Not the best quality for a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Jeselyn49

customer_reviews.title: too many brushes, not enough variety
customer_reviews.text: I knew it was 30 brushes, but they are all the same. there are multiples of each and honestly, I don;t need 3 huge face brushes... I NEED 1. I was let down but the quallity is good.
customer_reviews.author: C Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Works great evem after many
customer_reviews.text: Still using this 2 years later. Works great evem after many cleanings
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner set!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with a ton of brushes, but the large face brushes (foundation brush, blush brush etc) suck so I threw them out immediately . The package came extremely quick and all the smaller brushes were quality so was the package. I'm a beginner with makeup so this pack works for me, but if you are looking for top quality you won't find it here.
customer_reviews.author: Keahna Akins

product_meta.title: eBoTrade 32 Pcs Professional Cosmetic Makeup Brush Set Kit with Synthetic Leather Case,Black
product_meta.description:
AMERICA'S MOST RELIABLE ELECTRONIC PRODUCT BRAND
✔Faster and safer products with our leading eBoTrade technology 
✔10 million+ happy users and counting 

Features: 
✔ This 32 pc set includes all the brushes you'll ever need to create perfectly polished makeup styles. Perfect for professional salons or personal use! Each brush is covered with a clear plastic wrap for cleanliness. Our exclusively selected natural hair mineral makeup brushes will make a great addition to your collection. 
✔ This complete collection of luxury makeup brushes includes the essential brushes used by professional makeup artists throughout the makeup world. 

Description: 
✔ Size: Black Pouch bag is about 8.2inch length 
✔ Material: Natural hair 
✔ Color: Black 
✔ Brushes set contains: Powder Brush, Large Contour Brush, Square Shadier Brush, Large Sable Shadier Brush, Small Sable Shadier Brush, Lip Brush, Mascara Brush, Large Synthetic Shadier Brush, Etc

How to clean makeup brushes: 
1. Run the bristles of brush under warm running water. 
2. Apply a small amount of gentle shampoo to bristles and work into a light lather. 
3. Rinse bristles thoroughly under running water. You will notice that the water leaving the brush is tinted from old makeup. 
4. Continue rinsing until no color leaves the brush. 
5. Allow it to air-dry. 

Package Included: 
✔ 1 x 32 Pcs Professional Cosmetic Makeup Brush Set with Leather Case
feature_bullets: 32 Piece brush set in a beautiful pouch
Brushes are made of quality natural hair and synthetic fiber for lasting performance
Eco-Friendly. high quality makeup case designed for professional use
The most organized and elegant way to carry your make up and cosmetics
Roll up carrying case stores and protects brushes with ease.
